name: Friday Night Funkin Remade UPDATE
description:
I remade FNF kinda, this is still a WIP right now but here's a demo. Plus this is only for PC no mobile sorry.

Controls
  • Press Z to turn on bot.
  • Press X to turn off bot.
  • Press R to reset.
  • Press C to turn on controls ingame
  • Press V to turn off controls ingame

Check out the original game: https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin.
